overview: A little pup meets with his best friend on the outskirts of a land known as a table. They may both be the cutest most adorable puppies to exist on the face of the earth. However one of our beloved dogs gets stuck in a bowl while his fellow pup is free to escape the grasps of the table on a plate. With no help whatsoever from his fellow pup will the “Dog in the Bowl” escape or will he be forever trapped for life’s eternity. Watch to find out this exciting tale!!!
tagline: THE CUTEST THING ON ALL OF PLANET EARTH
title: Doggo in a Bowl
